alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 11 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Colorado, Kansas and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in Colorado, Cheyenne, Kit Carson and Yuma. In Kansas, Cheyenne, Decatur, Gove, Graham, Logan, Norton, Rawlins, Sheridan, Sherman, Thomas and Wallace. In southwest Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow. * WHEN...Through early Friday Morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
